toolSpec.name: prompt_refinement
toolSpec.description: Use this tool to clarify and augment the prompt when user's question is too ambiguous or too complex to be used for Text-to-SQL tasks.

toolSpec.name: query_generation
toolSpec.description: Use this tool to generate the query to query the database to resolve the user's question. Ensure that the prompt is well-defined before using this tool. If the prompt is insufficient, use the 'prompt_refinement' tool first

toolSpec.name: validate_and_run_queries
toolSpec.description: Use this tool to execute the SQL queries after generating the queries by using 'query_generation' tool or referencing the sample queries. Only one statement can be executed at a time, so if multiple queries need to be executed, use this tool repeatedly

generated_query.description: The SQL query to execute. It should be formatted as "SELECT ...;"
